MENLO PARK, Calif., Feb. 22, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Facebook, Inc. (FB) today announced that Brad Smallwood, Vice President of Marketing Science, will participate in the Jefferies Media & Communications Conference on February 23rd at 2:20 p.m. Eastern Time.  A live webcast and replay of the session will be available on Facebook's Investor Relations website at: http://investor.fb.com. Disclosure Information Facebook uses the investor.fb.com website and Mark Zuckerberg's Facebook Page (https://www.facebook.com/zuck) as means of disclosing material non-public information and for complying with its disclosure obligations under Regulation FD.  About Facebook Founded in 2004, Facebook's mission is to give people the power to share and make the world more open and connected. People use Facebook to stay connected with friends and family, to discover what's going on in the world, and to share and express what matters to them.
